com.salimov.yurii.config

Class CaptchaConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salimov.yurii.config.CaptchaConfig

  • @Configuration
 @PropertySource(value="classpath:captcha.properties")
public class CaptchaConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    The class describes a google captcha configurations.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yurii Salimov (yuriy.alex.salimov@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    Captcha
